thread.title: Report: Odom promised he's 'done with drugs' to Kardashian
thread.title_full: Report: Odom promised he's 'done with drugs' to Kardashian

author: Ricky Doyle
title: Report: Odom promised he's 'done with drugs' to Kardashian
text:
Report: Odom promised he's 'done with drugs' to Kardashian NESN 6 hrs ago Ricky Doyle © Imeh Akpanudosen/Getty Images Lamar Odom reportedly assured Khloe Kardashian that he's finished with drugs. Lamar Odom is changing his ways following his near-death experience. Or so he says.
AdChoices Odom told his wife, Khloe Kardashian, over the weekend that he knew he almost died in the hospital last week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, sources told TMZ. The NBA star reportedly promised, “I am done with drugs,” and repeatedly told Kardashian he loved her.
Kardashian rushed to Odom’s side as the two-time NBA champion fought for his life. Odom since has awoken from his coma, and the couple appears to be repairing their once-broken relationship.
TMZ reported Wednesday that Odom and Kardashian called off their divorce . Kardashian, a reality TV star, reportedly made the decision to withdraw the couple’s divorce papers right after Odom vowed over the weekend to stay clean.
Will Odom lay off the drugs? We shall see. The Kardashian family has heard such promises from Odom before and not everyone is onboard with Khloe’s decision to take back her hubby, according to TMZ.
